passage.title: A hungry lion
passage.paragraph: A hungry lion is coming from a forest. He arrives at a village. He wants to find something to eat. He comes to a house and pulls at the door. But it is closed. He sees that there is a mouse inside.
"Hello, I've come to visit you," he tells the mouse, "I know that you are ill. Please come out and let me take your temperature."
"Thank you," says the mouse, "but if I go out, you will kill me."
